Authors:
Jun Rong, Youri Lammers, Jared L. Strasburg, Natasha S.
Schidlo, Yavuz Ariyurek, Tom J. de Jong, Peter G. L. Klinkhamer, Marinus
J. M. Smulders, Klaas Vrieling
Title:
New insights into domestication of carrot from root
transcriptome analyses
Abstract:
Background: Understanding the molecular basis of
domestication can provide insights into the processes of rapid evolution
and crop improvement. Here we demonstrated the processes of carrot
domestication and identified genes under selection based on
transcriptome analyses.
